headline: Franklin Resources, Inc. to Announce First Quarter Results on January 30, 2026
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., January 07, 2026--On Friday, January 30, 2026 at approximately 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time, Franklin Resources, Inc. (the "Company") [NYSE:BEN] will release its first quarter operating results. A written commentary on the results will also be available via investors.franklinresources.com at approximately 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time.

headline: Franklin's December AUM Balance Rises Sequentially on Net Inflows
summary: BEN's December AUM rose to $1.68T, fueled by $28B in net inflows, with gains across equity, fixed income, and alternative assets.
